In addition to the above five year budget, we hereby request $36,000
to provide for the purchase of new tape duplicating equipment to replace
present mass duplicators. Such equipment Is essential If the nation's
only educational radio network service is to be maintained, or expanded,
to meet increased needs. Many of these needs must be met by radio, as
is already illustrated in many areas where TV station facilities are
already taxed to the breaking point, with the flood of students and
pressures still over the horizon. This equipment will also be used for
engineering research development as well.
